body_html:
I have no experience with pyenv. Does it work if you just use virtualenv directly?
Oh, also does it work if you try compiling without GPU support?
Also, can you specify exactly what non default configure options you used?

@jart, do you have any ideas on this? I am kind of stumped.

body:
I have no experience with pyenv. Does it work if you just use virtualenv directly?
Oh, also does it work if you try compiling without GPU support?
Also, can you specify exactly what non default configure options you used?

@jart, do you have any ideas on this? I am kind of stumped.
